/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g    -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/orocos_kinematics_dynamics/orocos_kdl/install_dir/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/geometry/tf/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/bullet/lib -pthread CMakeFiles/talker.dir/src/talker.o  -o ../bin/talker -rdynamic -L/opt/ros/fuerte/lib -L/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/orocos_kinematics_dynamics/orocos_kdl/install_dir/lib -L/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/geometry/tf/lib -L/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/bullet/lib -lorocos-kdl -lroslib -ltf -lboost_thread-mt -lBulletDynamics -lBulletCollision -lLinearMath -lmessage_filters -lroscpp -lrostime -lrosconsole -lroscpp_serialization -lxmlrpcpp -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/orocos_kinematics_dynamics/orocos_kdl/install_dir/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/geometry/tf/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/bullet/lib
